entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High plus 4.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
